::Epyon::

He yells again, as the theeth go through his arm.
"Damn you!"
The green globe on Epyon's chest starts to glow. 
"Eat this scum!"
A huge energy blast erupts from the orb. The force carries Epyon back,
away from his opponent. The huge blast should be hitting SS, from point
blank range.
